duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the hiring and training of team members, maintaining strategic and daily operational plans to ensure overall Guest and Team Member satisfaction.
Maintain artistic and thematic integrity of attraction and overall land, ensuring department understands and follows all company policies and procedures.
Supervise all hourly staff and provide work direction, performance reviews, and effective coaching. Investigate and handle incidents, including guest complaints and crisis management.

Plan and implement action plans for the department’s future success, including training programs, workforce planning, and rewards and recognition programs. Support Team Member and Guest Satisfaction initiatives for consistent improvement.

Maintain operational efficiency of attractions during park hours and seasonal/special events. Act as EHS Safety Team representative for the Team Members. Ensure collective bargaining agreements are upheld and promote an environment of diversity, equity, and inclusion.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Operations, or Hospitality is highly preferred (Master's preferred)
